titleStmt.title: An exact diurnall of the Parliament of ladyes Ordered by the ladyes in Parliament, that they declared that Prince Rupert, Lord Digby, Lord Capell, Lord Cottington, Dr. Williams, Mr. Walter, L. Hopton, L. Culpepper, Dr. Duppa, Sir R. Greenvill, L. Jermine, and Major Gen. Vrrey, have all their pardons granted to them by this court Clericus.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Neville by Wing.
With a woodcut illustration on the title page. "An inferior reprint of the pamphlet, omitting the woodcut, was made in the 19th century"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
